players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed his role. We need to vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "That is a blatant lie, Alice. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso. Why are you trying to mislead us?"
Diana: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of the unknown Bob? That seems like a waste of an investigation."

You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, then tell us - who did you investigate? You claim Diana is the mafioso but you haven't provided the same level of detail I have. I investigated Charlie because I had a gut feeling, and I was right -..."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is mafioso. Alice is lying to protect her partner."

Diana: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? That was a wasted investigation. Charlie, you claim I'm mafia but provide no proof. I'm a villager and I think one of you is lying."
